title: Barnard President on Coronavirus Impact on Higher Ed
itunes:title: Barnard President on Coronavirus Impact on Higher Ed
description:
Barnard President Sian Beilock discusses how the coronavirus outbreak is impacting higher education and ways people can deal with the stress of the situation. She says compartmentalizing your time and keeping a schedule can help reduce anxiety. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
